channel.title: Kafka Summit on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Kafka Summit on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Kafka Summit GoldenGate bridge run/walk
item.description: Coming to Kafka Summit in San Francisco next week? Inspired by similar events at Oracle OpenWorld in past years, I’m proposing an unofficial run (or walk) across the GoldenGate bridge on the morning of Tuesday 1st October. We should be up and out and back in plenty of time to still attend the morning keynotes. Some people will run, some may prefer to walk, it’s open to everyone :)

item.title: Kafka Summit GoldenGate bridge run/walk - MQTT test
item.description: BONUS: I’m planning to setup a demo based on Simon Aubury’s excellent race-mapper. Each person shares their location from their phone during the run to an MQTT server which is then streamed to Kafka and KSQL for some funky viz in Kibana. ⚠️️️️️️⚠️ This involves sharing your personal location. You can do the run/walk without signing up for this app! It’s a purely optional exercise if you want to join in with it.
